quotes.quote: Israel deserves America's friendship in reality - not just in rhetoric.
The Land of Israel needs a People and the People of Israel needs a Land.
Israel will endure and flourish. It is the child of hope and the home of the brave.
Israel is the canary in the mine. What happens to Israel will eventually happen to America itself.
Israel, the Jewish state, the only democracy in the Middle East, continues to shine as a beacon of light in the darkest region of the world.
The State of Israel will prove itself not by material wealth, not by military might or technical achievement, but by its moral character and human values.
In Israel, in order to be a realist you must believe in miracles.
The State of Israel was not established by anxiety but, rather, through pride.
Israel is a fulfilled dream. Nothing that exists here existed here a hundred years ago.
Israel desperately needs peace if it is to come anywhere close to being the 'light unto nations' of Jewish dreams.
Israel has created a new image of the Jew in the world - the image of a working and an intellectual people, of a people that can fight with heroism.
In Israel we tend to be carried away by our emotions.
Israel must be like a mad dog, too dangerous to bother.
If Israel is forced to stand alone, Israel will stand alone.
Israel... is one of the great outpost of democracy in the world.
Israel is moving from the realm of poetry to the realm of prose.
Israel is thirsting for water, and Turkey is overflowing with it.
The security of Israel is a moral imperative for all free peoples.
Israel itself is the strongest guarantee against another Holocaust.
Israel has incredible entrepreneurial spirit and a deep bench of technology talent.
The harm done to Israel is damage done to the West. And delegitimizing Israel is a delegitimization of the West.
Israel is not dangerous on one hand, but on the other hand it is dangerous. Human life is just dangerous, in general.
Israel is still the only country in the world against which there is a written document to the effect that it must disappear.
Israel is a democratic state with an independent judiciary, a free press and a diverse population of many cultures, religions and creeds.
Israel is a piece of real estate that neither Jew or Arab will let go of; neither will leave these shores. And so they will have to learn to live together.
Israel is one of the greatest and most modern democracies on the planet.
Israel has always been and must always be America's strongest ally.
Israel has an important principle: It is only Israel that is responsible for our security.
Israel is a country that respects freedom - freedom of assembly, freedom of speech and freedom of worship.
Today, Israel is stronger than ever. Israel has defensive tools of its own - those developed in the past and those developed today and those that will be developed tomorrow.
Israel is not an aviary.
Israel is the only democracy in the Middle East.
Israel produces more conceptual products than any other country.
Israel has its own right as a nation to defend its national security.
Israel always has to be in a position to defend itself against any adversary and against any threat of any kind.
Israel is an independent country with a large army, and it has the ability to do what it thinks is right.
Israel must be able to defend itself - by itself - against any threat.
